feed.title: Cypress Hills (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Cypress Hills (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:04 AM CST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cypress Hills Provincial Park 04:00 AM CST Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: -9.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -10.9°C
Wind: NE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Fog. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 01:55 AM CST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Fog dissipating. High minus 3 except plus 4 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3 except plus 4 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 01:55 AM CST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 01:55 AM CST Saturday 25 March 2023
